original_title: เธอ เหงา เรา เต่า
overview: After being betrayed by his colleague, Mix, a talented young architect starts working in a new company. Soon after, a Christmas outing is organized, but he cannot go because he has not yet completed a work. Then, he meets Bell, an intern who was doing an internship when no one was around  Mix came up with a fun idea, he organized a party for lonely people with a game: whoever invited the most people to the party wins!
title: Alone in Outing
